name: Coin Jump
description:
Help the Godot-branded coin get to the green platform.

To do this, hold Space to power up for a flick, or use Left/Right/A/D to change the direction you are looking in.

Note that you can only land on heads (as in Godot Heads) on blue platforms, and only land on tails on gray platforms. Failing to fall on the proper side or falling out will result in you being returned to the last place you were.

Made for exactly three hours for TriJam 18.

You can pass the whole game, but there is no finish screen -- the last level repeats forever. Keep in mind that you might need a fair amount of luck before the physics engine lets you pass -- took me around 20 minutes to pass all the levels.

Warning: there are a few places where you can get stuck without being able to jump. There is no way to get out of them without restarting the whole game. Sorry!
